Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Civil Snake Ladder

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College for Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Entry Fees : 100/- per team.

Prizes :
Winner :₹1000
Runner Up: ₹500

Coordinators :

  • 1) Arya Shirbhate : 8767405578
  • 2) Ujwal Kalhane : 8625976803
  • 3) Palak Duratkar : 8767213493
  • 4) Likhit Jain : 9579720922

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. Bring your college ID Card and Receipt on event day
  • 2. Two members are allowed in each team
  • 3. All Rounds are knockout
  • 4. First Round - 5 to 6 teams will play and winner of them will go for second round
  • 5. Winning will be based on first reaching to finish point or the team which is not eliminated from the game
  • 6. All the winner of 1st Round will play for 2nd Round and so on.
  • 7. The information will be provided to you at the time of event
  • 8. Maximum entry restrictions - 40 teams (on first come first basis)
  • 9. All the pariticipants will be awarded with "Paricipation Certificates".
